title: "Co-Founders Pledged To Donate 80% Of Our Wealth": Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei
description: Many wealthy individuals, especially in the tech industry, view philanthropy as inevitably fraudulent or useless, Dario Amodei, CEO of Anthropic, a leading artificial intelligence company, said, describing this attitude as "cynical and nihilistic."
content:

title: AI pilot and robot aiming for faster lung cancer diagnosis
description: The pilot scheme, being launched by the NHS, will use artificial intelligence (AI) and robotic technology to improve the detection and biopsy.
content:
The pilot scheme, being launched by the NHS, will use artificial intelligence (AI) and robotic technology to improve the detection and biopsy of hard-to-reach lung cancers.

title: Silicon Valley wants to build AI that can improve AI on its own
description: Ricursive Intelligence, founded by two former Google researchers and valued at US$4bil, is among several efforts to automate the creation of artificial intelligence.
content: SAN FRANCISCO: One new startup is called Recursive with an “e”. Another is called Ricursive with an “i”. They are trying to do the same thing: Build artificial intelligence that can improve itself without the help of humans, an obsession of Silicon V... [4203 chars]

title: Trump’s Transportation Department is using AI to write regulations.
description:
Google’s Gemini, in particular, according to ProPublica, citing internal communications. The regulations don’t even have to be that good, officials say; “We don’t need the perfect rule on XYZ. We don’t even need a very good rule on XYZ,” one official is reported to have said. This will surely end well.

title: In Depth: Tencent Bets Its AI Future on 28
